original_title: 新婚の日葵先生は校内一、問題児の性玩具をさせられている。
overview: Half a year ago, I married my colleague's husband. I was happy But a month ago, her husband became depressed because of overwork. Teachers taking turns teaching in place of her husband who is on leave. Feeling the silent pressure, I could not refuse any request. Advisor of club activities, unreasonable treatment of parents, and homeroom teacher of a special classroom where problem children are gathered. And I was raped by my student Akiyama-kun.
title: Newlywed Hiyori-sensei Is The Best In The School. Made to Be Sex Toy of Rough Class Members. Minami Hatsukawa
